modName: Syynxs Improved Potions - Longer Potion Duration
summary: This is a fairly simple mod that makes a few hardcore changes to potions, potions are duration based and no longer stack.
descriptionHtml:
This is a fairly simple mod that makes a few hardcore changes to potions.

Healing Potions restore Health/Stamina/Magicka over 25/30/35/40/45/50 seconds
Fortify Potions last for 300 seconds (5 minutes)
Fortify Health/Stamina/Magicka potions are twice as powerful, they now increase Health/Stamina/Magicka by 40/80/120/160/200
Potions no longer stack, this means you cannot down 30 Restore Health potions and gain godmode for it\'s duration
author: Jjiinx
